definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: The salesman was afraid when he heard what sounded like the mountain breaking.
sentences.chinese: 推销员对山里传出震耳欲聋的响声感到十分害怕。

sentences.english: The power of your ear-splitting war cry echoes across the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 你震耳欲聋的战争呐喊在战场上回荡。

sentences.english: Amid deafening applause, people on the platform went ashore in succession.
sentences.chinese: 在震耳欲聋的鞭炮声中，试航人员依次上岸。

sentences.english: Somewhere through the roar sounded the terrified scream of some wounded animal.
sentences.chinese: 震耳欲聋的轰隆声中分明夹杂着伤兽的咆哮。

sentences.english: The cataract deafened the ear with its roar.
Deafening fire-crackers exploded here and there.
sentences.chinese: 震耳欲聋的鞭炮声到处响了起来。

sentences.english: Sidewalk vendors use banks of speakers to pour out reggae music at an ear-thumping volume.
sentences.chinese: 街边小贩用一排麦克风倾泄震耳欲聋的瑞格舞音乐。

sentences.english: The higher volume settings are literally ear-splitting indoors.
sentences.chinese: 最大的音量设置上写的是室内震耳欲聋。

sentences.english: With the cheerful deafening sound of gongs and drums, firecrackers, long jump dance.
sentences.chinese: 随着欢快震耳欲聋的锣鼓声，鞭炮声，龙跳跃起舞。

sentences.english: At the party, everyone danced to the deafening music wildly .
sentences.chinese: 在舞会上，大家疯狂地随著震耳欲聋的音乐飙舞。

sentences.english: We heard a thunderous sound of explosion. I fell on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我听到一声震耳欲聋的爆炸声，我就倒在地上了。
你们的沉默是震耳欲聋的。

sentences.english: Flavor A warrior's deafening howl can break an enemy's ranks from within.
sentences.chinese: 战士震耳欲聋的吼叫声能从内部凿开敌人的队伍。

sentences.english: As Jon strode past them, a booming voice called after him.
sentences.chinese: 琼恩大步走过他们时，一个震耳欲聋的声音朝他叫来。

sentences.english: I was nearly maddened by the deafening noise of firecrackers.
sentences.chinese: 听着震耳欲聋的爆竹声我烦躁得几乎要发疯了。

definition: loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
